v0.1.4, Dec 06, 2014 -- Update
  - Code refactored, moved TAP, MD and Helper functions into classes
  - Creation/Deletion of single Taps and MDs

v0.1.3, Oct 13, 2014 -- Minor Update
  - cTap2StreamInterceptEnable was incorrectly set to "false"
  
v0.1.2, Aug 21, 2014 -- Minor Update
  - Packaged with README.rst
  
v0.1.1, May 29, 2014 -- Minor Update
  - Added check if target IP and SNMP credentials are set before building SNMP messages

v0.1.0, May 28, 2014 -- Initial release.
